results.title: David Oyelowo Fights for Representation in Family Films
results.abstract: The actor turned to directing after an eye-opening discussion with his son. He realized he couldn’t rely on Hollywood to find stories he wanted to tell.

multimedia.caption: David Oyelowo has taken a larger role behind the scenes to get projects made that reflect the complexities of people of color: “My job, I feel, is to normalize my existence,” he said.
multimedia.copyright: Michael Tyrone Delaney for The New York Times

results.title: Olympia Dukakis, Oscar Winner for ‘Moonstruck,’ Dies at 89
results.abstract: A veteran of the stage who also had a long list of film and TV credits, she was best known for playing characters who were worldly wise and world-weary.

multimedia.caption: Olympia Dukakis in the 1987 movie “Moonstruck.” She won an Academy Award for her portrayal of a sardonic Italian-American mother.

results.title: Coming Soon to a Hallowed Hall of Spaceflight: An X-Wing Fighter

results.title: Johnny Crawford, a Western Hero’s Son on ‘The Rifleman,’ Dies at 75
results.abstract: For five TV seasons he was at the side of Chuck Connors’s widowed sharpshooter. He also had some success as a pop singer, film actor and bandleader.

results.title: Vira Sathidar, Cultural Figure Who Fought India’s Caste System, Dies at 62
results.abstract: After a career of activism on behalf of the lower castes, Mr. Sathidar was cast in a movie that reflected his life. He died of complications of Covid-19.
results.byline: By Mujib Mashal and Hari Kumar

multimedia.caption: Vira Sathidar protested the deeply rooted caste system in India, under which those at the bottom are systematically abused. He played the role of a similar activist in the 2014 movie “Court”; he is shown here during shooting.

results.title: Anthony Powell, Oscar-Winning Costume Designer, Dies at 85
results.abstract: He was honored for “Travels With My Aunt,” “Death on the Nile” and “Tess.” He was also renowned for the outlandish outfits he created for Glenn Close as the evil Cruella de Vil.

results.title: Patti Harrison Wants to See What She Can Do
